item.description:
We all want to be loved, understood and accepted as we are. Yet the very defense mechanisms that are set up to keep us safe deprive us from receiving the deep nourishment we crave. In this fun, interactive class we will exercise our muscle of transparency, a key to being truly met.

Through the vehicles of movement, breath, sound, eye gazing, authentic dialog, deep listening and conscious touch, you will awaken your senses, have fun connecting with others, discover hidden aspects of yourself, and increase your capacity for intimacy.
item.how_to_find_us: upstairs through the door to the left of the Burren
item.name: Intimacy Fun(damentals)
